page.title: 08Local Issues
page.content: Many of the local people enjoy the environment of the open countryside,and the{Life-style}near to the sea.However there is a definite lack of facilities out of{Dovercourt} especially for the young. There is also growing cocern about he increased{Development}at the Quay,which will lead to more traffic on the by-pass.This has been a contentious issue in{local politics} with the village of Ramsey already split in half,and parents worried about the dangers which greater numbers of Heavy Goods vehicles will bring.A new roundabout has been proposed by the county,but many feel that pedestrians will still be at risk.
